articles.description: Plane crash survivor Austin Hatch suited up and was honored by Michigan on senior day.
articles.headline: Michigan honors Austin Hatch on senior day

articles.description: In this edition of Tipping The Scales, Treavor Scales highlights Michigan State's improbable comeback win over Northwestern University.
articles.headline: Tipping The Scales: Michigan State's historic comeback

images.caption: In this edition of Tipping The Scales, Treavor Scales highlights Michigan State's improbable comeback win over Northwestern University.
images.name: Tipping The Scales: Michigan State's historic comeback

articles.description: Joe Lunardi breaks down Oklahoma's NCAA tournament prospects after it suffered its fifth consecutive loss.
articles.headline: Oklahoma in need of wins

images.caption: Joe Lunardi breaks down Oklahoma's NCAA tournament prospects after it suffered its fifth consecutive loss.
images.name: Oklahoma in need of wins

articles.description: The Jayhawks are able to control their fate in the Big 12 race once again, after rallying to defeat West Virginia at home on Saturday.
articles.headline: Kansas' wild win sets up a huge week in the Big 12

images.caption: Devonte' Graham and the Jayhawks pulled even with Texas Tech atop the Big 12 standings Saturday. Kansas will visit Texas Tech on Feb. 24.
images.name: West Virginia vs. Kansas (Devonte' Graham #4 of the Kansas Jayhawks shoots over James Bolden #3 of the West Virginia Mountaineers) [576x324]

articles.description: KJ Feagin and Henry Caruso scored 18 points apiece and Emmanuel Ndumanya had 15 points and nine rebounds to help Santa Clara beat Pacific 72-68 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Feagin, Caruso help Santa Clara beat Pacific 72-68

articles.description: Elijah Stewart scored 28 points to lead Southern California to a 72-59 victory over Oregon State on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Stewart scores 28 points, leads USC past Oregon State 72-59

videos.description: LaGerald Vick cuts baseline and hammers a dunk down early against West Virginia.
videos.headline: Vick gets KU crowd going early with powerful slam

videos.description: Sagaba Konate shows off his renowned rim defense with an early block against Kansas.
videos.headline: Konate denies Mykhailiuk at the rim

videos.description: Udo Azubuike throws down the alley-oop after a nice give-and-go with Devonte Graham.
videos.headline: Graham finds Azubuike on the lob

videos.description: Bill Self says Kansas needs to play inside out against WVU but is happy his team has not turned the ball over much in the first half.
videos.headline: Self not happy with KU's play in 1st half

videos.description: Udo Azubuike sends Esa Ahmad's layup attempt into the crowd with authority.
videos.headline: Azubuike swats ball into the front row

videos.description: Daxter Miles Jr. shoots from deep beyond the arc, gets a friendly roll and puts the Mountaineers up 10 in the middle of the 2nd half.
videos.headline: Miles gets the shooter's roll to put WVU up by 10

videos.description: Sviatoslov Mykhailiuk turns defense into offense and gets Allen Fieldhouse rocking.
videos.headline: Mykhailiuk's steal and slam gives KU momentum

videos.description: Udoka Azubuike takes on contact and still is able to finish the two-handed flush.
videos.headline: Azubuike finishes with power at the rim plus the foul

videos.description: Udo Azubuike blocks a shot, Devonte Graham goes the other way and finds Malik Newman in the corner for 3.
videos.headline: Newman ties it at 66 late

videos.description: WVU head coach Bob Huggins gets ejected after yelling at officials during the final seconds of his team's loss to Kansas.
videos.headline: Huggins ejected after KU makes dagger layup

videos.description: Udoka Azubuike breaks down KU's come-from-behind win over WVU and what it took to erase the 10-point deficit.
videos.headline: Azubuike: 'We can beat any team in the country'
